mapper.select: select rsroomno, fk_roomno, R.fk_employeeid, E.name, rsubject, rdate, rtime, D.dname as rdname from tbl_rsroom R join tbl_employee E on R.fk_employeeid = E.employeeid join tbl_department D on E.fk_dcode = D.dcode where fk_roomno=#{roomno} and rdate = #{rdate}

select rsgno,fk_gno, R.fk_employeeid as fk_employeeid, E.name as name , rgsubject, rgdate, rgtime, gstatus, D.dname as rdname from tbl_rsgoods R join tbl_employee E on R.fk_employeeid = E.employeeid join tbl_department D on E.fk_dcode = D.dcode where fk_gno=#{gno} and rgdate = #{rgdate}

select rscno, fk_cno, fk_employeeid, E.name as name, rdestination, nvl(rcpeople,' ') as rcpeople, rcsubject, rcdate, rctime, cstatus from tbl_rscar R join tbl_employee E on R.fk_employeeid = E.employeeid where fk_cno=#{cno} and rcdate = #{rcdate}
select rdate, rtime, rstatus, roomname, rsubject from tbl_rsroom join tbl_room on fk_roomno = roomno where fk_employeeid = #{employeeid}
